metadata.title: CVE-2022-37601 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in function parseQuery in parseQuery.jsin webpack loader-utils 2.0.0 via the name variable in parseQuery.js.

criterions.comment: node-loader-utils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
